languages.text: Крупная полуодомашненная рептилия. Чаще всего разводится как скот или используется в качестве вьючного животного.
A large, semi-domesticated reptile. Grox are most commonly bred as livestock or used as beasts of burden.
languages.original_text: Крупная полуодомашненная рептилия. Чаще всего разводится как скот или используется в качестве вьючного животного.

traits.locale_text: Large, half-domesticated reptile widespread in the Imperium. Grox are most commonly bred as livestock or beasts of burden.
Large, half-domesticated reptile widespread in the Imperium. Grox are most commonly bred as livestock or beasts of burden.
A large, semi-domesticated reptile. Grox are most commonly bred as livestock or used as beasts of burden.
A large, semi-domesticated reptile. Grox are most commonly bred as livestock or used as beasts of burden.
A large, semi-domesticated reptile. Grox are most commonly bred as livestock or used as beasts of burden.
A large, semi-domesticated reptile. Grox are most commonly bred as livestock or used as beasts of burden.

languages.text: Ein großes, halb-domestiziertes Reptil. Grox werden meist als Nutztiere gezüchtet oder als Lasttiere eingesetzt.
languages.original_text: A large, semi-domesticated reptile. Grox are most commonly bred as livestock or used as beasts of burden.

traits.locale_text: Ein großes, halb-domestiziertes Reptil, das im Imperium weit verbreitet ist. Grox werden meist als Nutztiere oder Lasttiere gezüchtet.

languages.text: Grands reptiles partiellement domestiqués, les Grox sont communément élevés comme bétail ou bêtes de somme.
languages.original_text: A large, semi-domesticated reptile. Grox are most commonly bred as livestock or used as beasts of burden.

traits.locale_text: Grand reptile à moitié domestiqué très répandu dans l'Imperium. Les Grox sont communément élevés comme bétail ou comme bêtes de somme.

languages.text: 格洛克斯兽是半驯化的大型爬行动物，通常作为肉用牲畜或驮兽饲养。
languages.original_text: A large, semi-domesticated reptile. Grox are most commonly bred as livestock or used as beasts of burden.

traits.locale_text: 格洛克斯兽是半驯化的大型爬行动物，通常作为肉用牲畜或驮兽饲养。

languages.text: 半分家畜化された大型爬虫類。蜥蜴牛は家畜や重荷獣として飼育されるのが一般的である。
languages.original_text: A large, semi-domesticated reptile. Grox are most commonly bred as livestock or used as beasts of burden.

traits.locale_text: 帝国に広く生息する、半分家畜化された大型爬虫類。蜥蜴牛は家畜や重荷獣として飼育されるのが一般的である。

languages.text: Reptil semidomesticado de grandes dimensiones. Los grox suelen criarse como ganado o bestias de carga.
languages.original_text: A large, semi-domesticated reptile. Grox are most commonly bred as livestock or used as beasts of burden.

traits.locale_text: Reptil semidomesticado de grandes dimensiones que habita en varias partes del Imperium. Los grox suelen criarse como ganado o bestias de carga.
